items.summary: Add one additional seeded shirt item with color="Red" and pattern="Floral" to the backend initial dataset in `backend/main.mo` (`_initializeShops`), so that searching with filters itemType=Shirt, color=Red, pattern=Floral returns at least one result and the item has at least one shop in its item details.

Add a new static clothing photo file under `frontend/public/assets/generated` for the newly seeded red floral shirt item, and ensure the seeded backend itemâ€™s `photo` field exactly matches the added filename (including extension).
